title: Watch The World of Midnight Developer Panel VoD
summary: Join Senior Game Director Ion Hazzikostas and Associate Design Director Maria Hamilton as they take you further into zones, quests, and story of the Midnight expansion.

title: Carve through Sins of the Horadrim with Seasonal Splendor
summary: Bolster your efforts to claim Horadric Phials with the Seasonal Splendor limited-time boost.

title: Make a BIG Splash in Season 18: Stadium Quickplay!
summary: Dive into one of Overwatch 2’s biggest seasons ever with Stadium upgrades, a new Support Hero, Summer Games, and so much more!

title: Hotfixes: August 20, 2025
summary: Here you will find a list of hotfixes that address various issues related to World of Warcraft: The War Within, Mists of Pandaria Classic, Season of Discovery, WoW Classic Era, and Hardcore.

title: Pre-Purchase World of Warcraft®: Midnight™— Adventure Is Calling You Home
summary: Pre-purchase any edition of World of Warcraft: Midnight and gain future early access to Housing, letting you build, decorate, and personalize your new home in Azeroth before launch. By securing your copy ahead of time, you'll unlock a range of valuable benefits and rewards designed to help you prepare for the adventures and challenges awaiting you in the next chapter of The Worldsoul Saga™.

title: World of Warcraft: Midnight Revealed!
summary: Prepare to embark on an epic journey in World of Warcraft: Midnight. Explore new and reimagined zones, unlock a new race, and master thrilling new systems. Learn more about the exciting content coming your way.

title: Revealed: Co-Op Campaign, Multiplayer, and Zombies
summary: Embrace the madness: Black Ops 7 releases on November 14, featuring the most innovative Campaign in Black Ops history, a massive Multiplayer offering, and the next twisted chapter of Round-Based Zombies. Read on for all the details, including intel on next-level Omnimovement, cutting-edge weapons and technology, deep Weapon Camo grinds, Dead Ops Arcade 4, and much more!

title: Latest Intel: All Black Ops 7 Pre-purchase Benefits
summary: Pre-purchase your preferred Edition of Black Ops 7 now. Check out detailed overviews showcasing all the pre-purchase benefits you’ll receive between now and the game’s launch on November 14.

title: Diablo Immortal Bug Fixes and Patch Notes for All Platforms
summary: We will continually update this blog with all bug fixes and patches the team implements for Diablo Immortal on all platforms.

title: 33.2.2 Patch Notes
summary: Hearthstone balance changes, Battlegrounds updates, and bug fixes await in Patch 33.2.2!

title: WoW Weekly: Midnight Unveiled at gamescom, Legion Remix, Race to World First, and More!
summary: Stay informed with the freshest updates from World of Warcraft. This week, catch the reveal of Midnight for the first time in a live stream direct from gamesom, learn the latest about Legion Remix from our developers, follow along as competitors strive to overcome every hazard to secure Azeroth's future during the Race to World first in Manaforge Omega, and much more.

title: Weekly Recall: 2 Perks 2 Furious
summary: Season 18 brings a major Perks update, and associate hero designer Scott Kennedy is here to walk you through the process of inventing and improving upon Overwatch’s newest core system.

title: Run with The Smugglers' League in Season 17
summary: Seek out new contacts making a stealthy entrance on the trail of top-tier cargo!

title: The 2.4.0 PTR: What You Need to Know
summary: Don powerful Chaos Armor and enhance your abilities with Chaos Perks in the 2.4.0 PTR.

title: Kick off gamescom 2025 with Opening Night Live!
summary: gamescom 2025 kicks off with Opening Night Live beginning at 11:00 am PDT (20:00 CEST) on August 19. You can catch the reveal of Midnight for the first time in a live stream direct from Cologne, Germany. If you’re attending gamescom, you can join us at the World of Warcraft booth in Hall 8 for even more activities including a hands-on Housing demo.

title: Viewer’s Guide: Watch the Creator Clash at gamescom 2025
summary: Book your flights and grab your tickets, it’s almost time to watch the gamescom Creator Clash! Whether you’re joining us live from Cologne or from home, you’re in for an unforgettable experience!

title: Watch the Latest WoWCast to Learn about Legion Remix
summary: Join Community Manager Bethany Hudson as she sits down with Content Designer Josh Aaron Miller and Lead Game Producer Ray Bartos as they take you into the fast fun and Fel-filled seasonal event—Legion Remix.

title: Dondozo makes its big Pokémon GO debut during the Sunkissed Shores event!
summary: Monday, August 25, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 31, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time

title: Ghosts of K’aresh: Manaforge Omega Raid Now Live!
summary: Gather your allies and enter Manaforge Omega, a massive cosmic facility where the Shadow Guard Ethereals seek to revive Dimensius, the All-Devouring. Brave the arcane dangers and engage in the epic battles that await, culminating in a showdown that could decide the fate of Azeroth.

title: The Race to World First Is Underway in Manaforge Omega!
summary: As Manaforge Omega opens its doors in World of Warcraft: Ghosts of K'aresh, the ultimate test begins as top players and guilds race to face a series of arcane challenges culminating in a final encounter with Dimensius the All-Devouring. This demanding Race to World First demands teamwork, strategy, and resilience as competitors strive to overcome every hazard to secure Azeroth's future.

title: The War Within: Season 3 Raid, PvP, and More Now Live!
summary: Take charge of your destiny with all-new challenges in The War Within Season 3 with an all-new raid—Manaforge Omega, all-new dungeon—Eco-Dome Al'dani, a new Delve—The Archival Assault, a fresh rotation of challenging Mythic+ dungeons, a new PvP season, and more!

title: Join the Next Sanctuary Sitdown
summary: Join members of the development team in the Sanctuary Discord on August 14th to answer your questions in the next Sanctuary Sitdown.

title: Get codes for exclusive Timed Research during the 2025 Pokémon GO World Championships Twitch broadcast
summary: In addition to the upcoming Pokémon GO worldwide event and the live festivities taking place in Anaheim, California, we’re excited to share that Trainers will have the opportunity to get up to two codes for exclusive Timed Research by watching 30 minutes of the Pokémon GO Twitch live stream on Days 1 and 2 of the Pokémon GO World Championships!

title: Merciless Gauntlet Statistics
summary: The Merciless Gauntlet has concluded, congratulations to Ben_ for taking the top spot! It was a blast watching the action, so we've prepared some statistics from the event in today's news post. Check them out! Read More.

title: Rise to the Top in Bout of Realms
summary: Gather your most formidable allies and rise through the ranks in Bout of Realms, plus earn new Legendary Affixes.

title: Diablo IV Patch Notes

title: WoW Weekly: Ghosts of K'aresh Live, Twitch Drop, and Mists of Pandaria Classic Raid Schedule
summary: Stay informed with the freshest updates from World of Warcraft! This week, discover the launch of Ghosts of K’aresh, which brings new adventures in The War Within campaign, a brand-new zone to explore, and much more. Don’t miss out on earning the Shadefur Brewthief pet with the current Twitch Drop and check the schedule for upcoming Mists of Pandaria raids to plan your next challenges.

title: Patch 3.26.0e Preview
summary: We'll soon be releasing Patch 3.26.0e for Path of Exile, which contains a handful of improvements, including adjusting the location of the Recombinator in Kingsmarch, and numerous bugfixes. Check out a preview of the patch notes in today's news post! Read More.

title: Zizaran’s Class Gauntlet Event Starts on July 31st
summary: We’re once again partnering with Zizaran for another 10-day Class Gauntlet event which will start on July 31st PDT. Racers will need to endure some of the most challenging conditions Wraeclast can throw at them in order to survive the Merciless Gauntlet! Read More.

title: Hideout Showcase and Hideout Sale
summary: The horde of hideout homesteaders have handcrafted a heap of new hearty havens in Path of Exile 1! To aid aspiring architects, hideouts and decorations are on sale this weekend. Check out today's news post to find out more. Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Second Boss Kill Event
summary: Next Thursday, July 24th PDT, we’ll be hosting a second Boss Kill Event in Path of Exile where players can compete to kill the new Pinnacle Bosses from the Secrets of the Atlas expansion. The event will be available to our console players as well. The prize pool includes Godslayer’s Pride microtransactions and the opportunity to collaborate with our devs to create new Unique Items and Divination Cards. Find out more in this news post! Read More.

title: Phishing Emails Warning
summary: Some players have recently reported that they're receiving phishing emails impersonating our Support team members. We would like to remind everyone to carefully check that the email address you are receiving emails from is support@grindinggear.com before replying, and to never click on any suspicious links without checking the link's location. Read More.

For this news post we’ve gathered pieces of concept art for three new Pinnacles and the Armour Set. Check them out! Read More.

title: Pokémon GO and Major League Baseball knock it out of the park with a new partnership!
summary: Get ready to step up to the plate, Trainers–we’re excited to announce a partnership between Pokémon GO and Major League Baseball! During the 2025 season, all MLB ballparks will feature all-new, official club-branded PokéStops and Gyms so Trainers can play Pokémon GO from wherever they’re sitting in the ballpark. Trainers can also check out newly created Official Routes at the ballparks!
